paragraphs.text:
%md
# About
**Lab:** Create Cloudair
**Objective:** Become familiar with using Hive at scale
**File locations:** hostname:/tmp/cloudair hdfs:///data/cloudair
**Successful outcome:** Understanding Hive at scale
**Before you begin:** N/A
**Related lessons:** Hive at Scale

---

msg.data:
About

Lab: Create Cloudair
Objective: Become familiar with using Hive at scale
File locations: hostname:/tmp/cloudair hdfs:///data/cloudair
Successful outcome: Understanding Hive at scale
Before you begin: N/A
Related lessons: Hive at Scale

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Setup

paragraphs.title: Retrieve the files from devuser
paragraphs.text:
%sh
rm -r /tmp/cloudair
mkdir /tmp/cloudair
cp /home/devuser/data/cloudair/* /tmp/cloudair/

msg.data: rm: cannot remove ‘/tmp/cloudair’: No such file or directory

paragraphs.title: List the directory /tmp/cloudair
paragraphs.text:
%sh
ls /tmp/cloudair/

msg.data:
claim_savings.csv.bz2
eu_countries.csv.bz2
pos_txt.csv.bz2
provider_summary.csv.bz2
tax_2020.csv.bz2
us_customers.csv.bz2
ww_customers.csv.bz2

paragraphs.title: Use bunzip2 to extract the files
paragraphs.text:
%sh
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/claim_savings.csv.bz2
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/eu_countries.csv.bz2
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/pos_txt.csv.bz2
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/provider_summary.csv.bz2
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/tax_2020.csv.bz2
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/us_customers.csv.bz2
bunzip2 /tmp/cloudair/ww_customers.csv.bz2

paragraphs.title: List the contents of /tmp/cloudair
paragraphs.text:
%sh
ls /tmp/cloudair

msg.data:
claim_savings.csv
eu_countries.csv
pos_txt.csv
provider_summary.csv
tax_2020.csv
us_customers.csv
ww_customers.csv

paragraphs.title: Make the directories in HDFS
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /data/cloudair
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -mkdir /data/cloudair
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -chmod -R 777 /data/cloudair

hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /data/cloudair/claim_savings
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /data/cloudair/eu_countries
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /data/cloudair/provider_summary
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /data/cloudair/tax_2020
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /data/cloudair/us_customers
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /data/cloudair/ww_customers

paragraphs.title: Copy the datafiles in HDFS
paragraphs.text:
%sh
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/cloudair/claim_savings.csv /data/cloudair/claim_savings/
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/cloudair/eu_countries.csv /data/cloudair/eu_countries/
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/cloudair/provider_summary.csv /data/cloudair/provider_summary/
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/cloudair/tax_2020.csv /data/cloudair/tax_2020/
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/cloudair/us_customers.csv /data/cloudair/us_customers/
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/cloudair/ww_customers.csv /data/cloudair/ww_customers/

paragraphs.title: Grant Hive access to /data/cloudair
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -chown -R hive /data/cloudair

paragraphs.title: List the contents of HDFS /data/cloudair
paragraphs.text:
%sh
hdfs dfs -ls -h -R /data/cloudair

%md
# Lab

%md
# Result

msg.data:
Result

You have now: You have now successfully created a Hive materialized view.

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Solution
---

paragraphs.title: 1 - Create databases for Cloudair
2 - Create table claim_savings_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudair.claim_savings_stage;

CREATE TEMPORARY EXTERNAL TABLE cloudair.claim_savings_stage(
    `reportdate` date,
    `name` string,
    `sequenceid` int,
    `claimid` int,
    `costsavings` int,
    `eligibilitycode` int,
    `latitude` double,
    `longitude` double
    )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/data/cloudair/claim_savings';

paragraphs.title: 3 - Create managed table claim_savings as ORC format
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudair.claim_savings;

CREATE TABLE cloudair.claim_savings(
    `reportdate` date,
    `name` string,
    `sequenceid` int,
    `claimid` int,
    `costsavings` int,
    `eligibilitycode` int,
    `latitude` double,
    `longitude` double
    )
COMMENT 'Claims Savings'
STORED AS ORC;

paragraphs.title: 4 - Use an ITAS statement to load data into claim_savings
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
INSERT INTO cloudair.claim_savings SELECT * FROM cloudair.claim_savings_stage;

paragraphs.title: 5 - Drop table claim_savings_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE cloudair.claim_savings_stage;

paragraphs.title: 6 - Create table eu_countries_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudair.eu_countries_stage;

CREATE TEMPORARY EXTERNAL TABLE cloudair.eu_countries_stage(
  countryname string,
  countrycode string,
  region string
  )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/data/cloudair/eu_countries';

paragraphs.title: 7 - Create managed table eu_countries as ORC format
8 - Use an ITAS statement to load data into eu_countries
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
INSERT INTO cloudair.eu_countries SELECT * FROM cloudair.eu_countries_stage;

paragraphs.title: 9 - Drop table eu_countries_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudair.eu_countries_stage;

paragraphs.title: 10 - Create table provider_summary_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudair.provider_summary_stage;

CREATE TEMPORARY EXTERNAL TABLE cloudair.provider_summary_stage(
    `providerid` string,
    `providername` string,
    `providerstreetaddress` string,
    `providercity` string,
    `providerstate` string,
    `providerzip` string,
    `providerreferralregion` string,
    `totaldischarges` int,
    `averagecoveredcharges` decimal(10,2),
    `averagetotalpayments` decimal(10,2),
    `averagemedicarepayments` decimal(10,2)
    )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/data/cloudair/claims_provider_summary';

paragraphs.title: 11 - Create managed table provider_summary as ORC format
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudair.provider_summary;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE cloudair.provider_summary(
    `providerid` string,
    `providername` string,
    `providerstreetaddress` string,
    `providercity` string,
    `providerstate` string,
    `providerzip` string,
    `providerreferralregion` string,
    `totaldischarges` int,
    `averagecoveredcharges` decimal(10,2),
    `averagetotalpayments` decimal(10,2),
    `averagemedicarepayments` decimal(10,2)
    )
COMMENT 'Provider Summary'
STORED AS ORC;

paragraphs.title: 12 - Use an ITAS statement to load data into provider_summary
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
INSERT INTO cloudair.provider_summary SELECT * FROM cloudair.provider_summary_stage;

paragraphs.title: 13 - Drop table provider_summary_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE cloudair.provider_summary_stage;

paragraphs.title: 14 - Create table tax_2020_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudair.tax_2020_stage;

CREATE TEMPORARY EXTERNAL TABLE  cloudair.tax_2020_stage(
  ssn string,
  fed_tax double,
  state_tax double,
  local_tax double
  )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/data/cloudair/tax_2020';

paragraphs.title: 15 - Create table tax_2020
16 - Use an ITAS statement to load data into tax_2020
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
INSERT INTO cloudair.tax_2020 SELECT * FROM cloudair.tax_2020_stage;

paragraphs.title: 17 - Drop table tax_2020_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE cloudair.tax_2020_stage;

paragraphs.title: 18 - Create table us_customers_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
USE cloudair;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudair.us_customers_stage;

CREATE TEMPORARY EXTERNAL TABLE cloudair.us_customers_stage(
    RowNum string,
    Title string,
    FirstName string,
    MiddleInitial string,
    LastName string,
    NameSet string,
    StreetAddress string,
    City string,
    State string,
    StateFull string,
    Zipcode Int,
    Country string,
    CountryFull string,
    TelephoneCountryCode string,
    TelephoneNumber string,
    EmailAddress string,
    Username string,
    Password string,
    NationalID string,
    MRN Int,
    InsuranceID Int,
    CCType string,
    CCNumber string,
    CVV2 Int,
    CCExpires Date,
    Occupation string,
    Company string,
    Domain string,
    Vehicle string,
    Gender string,
    MothersMaiden string,
    Birthday Date,
    TropicalZodiac string,
    Age Int,
    EyeColor string,
    BloodType string,
    Weight Double,
    Height Int,
    Latitude Double,
    Longitude Double
    )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS 
TERMINATED BY ',' ESCAPED BY '"'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/data/cloudair/us_customers'
tblproperties("skip.header.line.count"="1");

paragraphs.title: 19 - Create managed table us_customers as ORC format
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)

CREATE TABLE cloudair.us_customers(
    RowNum string,
    Title string,
    FirstName string,

    NameSet string,

    TelephoneNumber string,
    EmailAddress string,
    Username string,

    NationalID string,
    MRN Int,
    InsuranceID Int,
    CCType string,
    CCNumber string,
    CVV2 Int,
    CCExpires Date,
    Occupation string,
    Company string,
    Domain string,
    Vehicle string,
    Gender string,
    MothersMaiden string,
    Birthday Date,
    TropicalZodiac string,
    Age Int,
    EyeColor string,
    BloodType string,
    Weight Double,
    Height Int,
    Latitude Double,
    Longitude Double
    )
STORED AS ORC;

paragraphs.title: 20 - Use an ITAS statement to load data into us_customers
paragraphs.text:

ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' 
ESCAPED BY '"'

tblproperties("skip.header.line.count"="1");

paragraphs.title: 23 - Create managed table ww_customers as ORC format
paragraphs.text:

paragraphs.title: 24 - Use an ITAS statement to load data into ww_customers
25 - Drop table ww_customer_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE cloudair.ww_customers_stage;

paragraphs.title: 26 - Drop view if exists and create view claims_view
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS cloudair.claims_view;

CREATE VIEW cloudair.claims_view AS
SELECT `claim_savings`.`reportdate`,
    `claim_savings`.`name`,
    `claim_savings`.`sequenceid`,
    `claim_savings`.`claimid`,
    `claim_savings`.`costsavings`,
    `claim_savings`.`eligibilitycode`,
    `claim_savings`.`latitude`,
    `claim_savings`.`longitude`
FROM `cloudair`.`claim_savings`;

paragraphs.title: 27 - Drop view if exist and create view prov_view
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudair.prov_view;

CREATE VIEW cloudair.prov_view AS
SELECT `provider_summary`.`providerid`,
    `provider_summary`.`providername`,
    `provider_summary`.`providerstreetaddress`,
    `provider_summary`.`providercity`,
    `provider_summary`.`providerstate`,
    `provider_summary`.`providerzip`,
    `provider_summary`.`providerreferralregion`,
    `provider_summary`.`totaldischarges`,
    `provider_summary`.`averagecoveredcharges`,
    `provider_summary`.`averagetotalpayments`,
    `provider_summary`.`averagemedicarepayments`
FROM `cloudair`.`provider_summary`;

paragraphs.text:
%md
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

1. [Cloudera Apache Spark Tutorials](http://hortonworks.com/tutorials/#tuts-developers) are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
2. [Cloudera Community Connection (HCC)](https://community.hortonworks.com/spaces/85/data-science.html?type=question) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
3. [Cloudera Apache Spark Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/spark-overview/content/analyzing_data_with_apache_spark.html) - official Spark documentation.
4. [Cloudera Apache Zeppelin Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/zeppelin-overview/content/overview.html) - official Zeppelin documentation.

msg.data:
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

  1. Cloudera Apache Spark Tutorials are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
  2. Cloudera Community Connection (HCC) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
  3. Cloudera Apache Spark Docs - official Spark documentation.
  4. Cloudera Apache Zeppelin Docs - official Zeppelin documentation.
